Society of Cutaneous Oncology
  • Journal of Cutaneous Oncology
  • SoCO Journal Club
  • Research Forum

Journal Club

Overview

Each month, the multi-institutional and multi-disciplinary SoCO reviews recent articles describing new insights germane to cutaneous oncology.

The following are the archive of the articles covered to date.

Shiny App

Click here to visualize an interactive Shiny application of all of the articles covered hitherto.

Articles
